comment: This is very sad that Conor has lost the fight to this animal. But he is going to rematch, which cannot but please me. McGregor's wife vs Nurmagomedov's wife. It is apparently which one is evil that must be defeated.

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / sad-02

                  :ARG1 (f / fight-01

                  :ARG0 (h / he)
                  :ARG1-of (p2 / please-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG0 (ii / i)
                        :ARG1-of (p3 / possible-01))))
      :snt3 (v2 / versus
            :op1 (p4 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h2 / have-rel-role-91
                        :ARG1 (p5 / person
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "McGregor"))
                        :ARG2 (w / wife)))
            :op2 (p6 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h3 / have-rel-role-91
                        :ARG1 (p7 / person
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Nur"
                                    :op2 "Magomedov"))
                        :ARG2 (w2 / wife))))
      :snt4 (o / obligate-01
            :ARG2 (d / defeat-01
                  :ARG1 (o2 / one
                        :mod (e / evil)))
            :ARG1-of (a2 / appear-02)))
